info.author: Niels Serup
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU Affero General Public License v3
info.description:
=================
Project MZ-Geo 97
=================

**No release out yet!**

Project MZ-Geo 97 is an RPG with focus on world history. In Project
MZ-Geo 97, you are part of a group of aliens orbiting Earth, having
chosen to overview the development of the human race.

Project MZ-Geo 97 is part of the roptoligs project. See the roptoligs
wiki at http://roptoligs.metanohi.org/ for details.


License
=======

Project MZ-Geo 97 is free software under the terms of the GNU Affero
General Public License version 3 (or any later version). This is
version 0.1.0 of the program.

The libraries used by Project MZ-Geo 97 are GPL-compatible.

The licenses used by the data in Project MZ-Geo 97 are listed in the
file ``LICENSING.txt``.


Installation
============

Way #1
------
Just run this (requires that you have python-setuptools installed)::

  easy_install3 mzgeo97

Way #2
------
Get the newest version of Project MZ-Geo 97 at
http://roptoligs.metanohi.org/games:mzgeo97 or at
http://pypi.python.org/pypi/mzgeo97.

Extract the downloaded file and run this in a terminal::

  python3 setup.py install

Dependencies
============

Project MZ-Geo 97 is to be run using tunasloth, a game engine. tunasloth
can be fetched by running ``easy_install3 tunasloth`` or by
downloading a tarball from
http://roptoligs.metanohi.org/modules:tunasloth or
http://pypi.python.org/pypi/tunasloth.


Use
===

To use it, run the program ``mzgeo97``. To see its options, run
``mzgeo97 --help``.

Development
===========

Project MZ-Geo 97 uses Git for code management. To get the latest branch,
clone it from gitorious.org like this::

  $ git clone git://gitorious.org/mzgeo97/mzgeo97.git


The logo
========

There is no logo yet.

  
This document
=============
Copyright (C) 2011  Niels Serup

Copying and distribution of this file, with or without modification,
are permitted in any medium without royalty provided the copyright
notice and this notice are preserved.  This file is offered as-is,
without any warranty.
